com.facebook.buck.core.rules.knowntypes

Interface KnownRuleTypes

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HybridKnownRuleTypes, KnownNativeRuleTypes, KnownUserDefinedRuleTypes

    public interface KnownRuleTypes
    Provides access to rule types and descriptions for both native and user defined rules.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RuleDescriptor<?> getDescriptorByName(String name)
      Get rule type, constructor arg and description object for by rule name.
      default <T extends ConstructorArg>
      RuleDescriptor<T>      		 getDescriptorByNameChecked(String name, Class<T> constructorArg)
      Safer version of getDescriptorByName(String).
